resources.string: It was detected that the system disabled the notification permission for this APP, for the complete music playing experience, please go to manually open the notification bar permission!
iMusic The local music list music cover loading feature is turned off by default. To turn it on or off, double-click the title bar "iMusic" to turn on or off cover loading
Local music cover loading turned on
Unable to restore after emptying search records, do you want to continue?
There is no search record to clear
The search music will be added to the playback record after playing, because the reason why the song can be played for the first time is usually about 23 hours, please know!
In the search, please wait a minute...
Please try it first and collect it later
The song has been taken off the shelves
Are you sure you want to remove this song from the favorites list?
Are you sure you want to delete this song from the playback record?
Are you sure you want to clear the most recent playback records?
You denied access to local storage and could not find local music
Are you sure you want to remove this song from the list?
Thank you for your support and love, your support is the driving force for me to move forward! Click on "reward" and immediately go to Alipay to reward the author.
Local music cover loading turned on
Local music cover load turned off
Background playback needs to turn on the floating window playback function. Please go to the system to set the permission to open the floating window
Please turn it on manually in the settings

Music playback needs to open the suspension window permissions, so that you can better experience the playback function! After the suspension window permission is turned on, Xiaomi users should also allow the backstage pop-up interface. Do you want to open the suspension window immediately?
Not open for the time being
Read local audio files require read local storage permission
The write data to Storage permission is required to play the record store
Read local storage permission is denied, please click\'to set\'to manually turn on read local storage permission

Due to the limitations of Xiaomi ROM, iMusic can not buffer and play online music under the lock screen or background. Go to system Settings-Power and performance-scene configuration to turn off sleep mode. You can experience it normally.
